name: INVALID BREAK
description:
skate across sand as you dash through walls and foes in this small arcade game. made for wowie jam 2.0. the theme of the jam was "intentional bugs."

a game by may bell 🌻

sound credits:

"Glass Shatter 3" by lurpsis, freesound.org
"Axe Impact - Gore" by LiamG_SFX, freesound.org
"Spider Voice" by columbia23, freesound.org
"sand sift on sand FF663" by martinimeniscus, freesound.org
